title: Step 45

challengeFiles.name: index
challengeFiles.contents: CSS Color Markers
challengeFiles.seed: CSS Color Markers

challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your code should no longer have a .two class selector.
You should use a class selector to target the class green.
Your .green CSS rule should have a background-color property set to rgb(0, 0, 0).
Your code should no longer have a .three class selector.
You should use a class selector to target the class blue.
Your .blue CSS rule should have a background-color property set to rgb(0, 0, 0).

description: Update the CSS class selector .two so it targets the new green class. And update the .three class selector so it targets the new blue class.
